groupId.description: Generated artifact package's organization (i.e. maven groupId).

enumPropertyNaming.description: Naming convention for enum properties: 'camelCase', 'PascalCase', 'snake_case', 'UPPERCASE', and 'original'

featureAutoHead.description: Automatically provide responses to HEAD requests for existing routes that have the GET verb defined.

featureConditionalHeaders.description: Avoid sending content if client already has same content, by checking ETag or LastModified properties.

featureHSTS.description: Avoid sending content if client already has same content, by checking ETag or LastModified properties.

featureCORS.description: Ktor by default provides an interceptor for implementing proper support for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS). See enable-cors.org.

featureCompression.description: Adds ability to compress outgoing content using gzip, deflate or custom encoder and thus reduce size of the response.
